channel.title: This is Miles
channel.description: Recent content on This is Miles

item.title: About
item.description: Miles is a Seattle-based, NYC-habitu√© researcher and engineer. He currently works full time as a machine learning engineer at HERE Research, automating map data creation with deep learning and computer vision techniques. Seven years ago, he joined HERE, a Nokia Company. Prior to joining the Research team, he worked on the Data Science team, tackling heterogeneous challenges such as conventional machine learning model development, geospatial data visualization, technology transfer from Research to Engineering, technical evaluation for business acquisition, etc.
